Description:
We are a dynamic and forward-thinking agricultural company dedicated to revolutionizing the industry through innovation and sustainable practices. As we expand our online presence and engage with our community, we are seeking a talented and creative individual to join our team as an Online Community Manager and Graphic Designer.As an Online Community Manager and Graphic Designer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our online presence and establishing a strong connection with our target audience. You will be responsible for managing our social media platforms, creating compelling visual content, and fostering a vibrant and engaged online community. This position requires a unique combination of creativity, strategic thinking, and excellent communication skills.Responsibilities:Develop and implement a comprehensive social media strategy to enhance brand awareness and engage our target audience within the agriculture industry.
Create visually appealing and engaging graphics, images, and videos for use on various digital platforms, including social media, websites, and marketing campaigns.
Manage and curate content for our social media channels, ensuring consistent messaging and brand identity across all platforms.
Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries from our online community, providing exceptional customer service and building strong relationships.
Collaborate with internal teams to gather information, insights, and data to inform content creation and community engagement strategies.
Stay updated on industry trends, digital marketing best practices, and emerging social media platforms, and implement innovative ideas to continuously improve our online presence.
Track and analyze social media metrics and key performance indicators (KPIs), providing regular reports and insights to drive data-informed decision-making.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in managing social media platforms and cultivating online communities, preferably within the agriculture or related industry.
Strong graphic design skills, with proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or other relevant design software.
A portfolio showcasing a range of visually appealing and impactful design work, including social media graphics, infographics, and other digital assets.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to tailor messaging to different audiences and maintain a consistent brand voice.
A keen eye for detail, creativity, and the ability to think strategically about design and community engagement.
Knowledge of agricultural industry trends, terminology, and target audience preferences is a plus.
Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Bachelor's degree in graphic design, marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred.
